sense.gloss: to take advantage of, to impose on, to exploit
to enter (an item in a ledger), to make an entry (in an account book)

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑寛大↑↓かんだい↓な↑性格↑↓せいかく↓に↑付↑↓|つ↓け↑込↑↓こ↓む|べきではない。
sdata.e: You should not play on his generous nature.

sdata.j: ↑人↑↓ひと↓の↑好意↑↓こうい↓に↑付↑↓|つ↓け↑込↑↓こ↓む|のはいやだね。
sdata.e: I wouldn't like to cash in on other people's misfortunes.

sdata.j: ↑相手↑↓あいて↓の↑弱↑↓よわ↓みに|つけ↑込↑↓こ↓む|ような↑振↑↓ふ↓る↑舞↑↓ま↓いだけはやめようや。
sdata.e: I want you to stop preying on people's weaknesses.

sdata.j: ↑相場↑↓そうば↓↑師↑↓し↓の↑中↑↓なか↓には↑老人↑↓ろうじん↓の↑無知↑↓むち↓と↑寂↑↓さび↓しさに↑付↑↓|つ↓け↑込↑↓こ↓む|↑奴↑↓やつ↓がいる。
sdata.e: Some speculators take advantage of the ignorance and helplessness of old people.

sdata.j: ↑他人↑↓たにん↓の↑弱↑↓よわ↓みに↑付↑↓|つ↓け↑込↑↓こ↓む|な。
sdata.e: Don't take advantage of others' weakness.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑弱↑↓よわ↓みに↑付↑↓|つ↓け↑込↑↓こ↓む|のはやめなさい。
sdata.e: Stop taking advantage of his weakness.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓はしばしば↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓の↑無知↑↓むち↓に|つけ↑込↑↓こ↓む|。
sdata.e: He often takes advantage of her ignorance.

sdata.j: ↑人↑↓ひと↓の↑弱↑↓よわ↓みに↑付↑↓|つ↓け↑込↑↓こ↓む|ことはやめろよな。
sdata.e: I want you to stop preying on people's weaknesses.
